section.p: The weight of one substance compared to the weight of an equal volume of another substance at the same temperature.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] baricityCode with data type Code
Contains a code corresponding to the baricity of the anesthesia drug fluid vehicle in relationship to the spinal fluid. Suggested Like values: 1:HYPERBARIC, 2:HYPOBARIC, 3:ISOBARIC.., etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] baricityCode with data type Code
Contains a code corresponding to the baricity of the anesthesia drug fluid vehicle in relationship to the spinal fluid. Suggested Like values: 1:HYPERBARIC, 2:HYPOBARIC, 3:ISOBARIC.., etc.
